data.title: Amazon.com: The Janson Directive: 9780312253486: Ludlum, Robert: Books
data.meta_description: Amazon.com: The Janson Directive: 9780312253486: Ludlum, Robert: Books
data.text:
Customers find the storyline engaging, action packed, and suspenseful. They appreciate the twists and turns that keep them guessing. Readers also praise the beautifully crafted thriller that reveals nothing until the last chapter. They also mention the book is gripping and well written.

"...This is an amazing book that reveals nothing until the last chapter and even then the suspense does not let up until the last page...." Read more

"...good job with all of the voices and reads very clear and keeps the listerner interested. However, that being said, the story itself is not very good...." Read more

"...An exciting plot that keeps you guessing until the end.I listened to the 18 disc unabridged audio CDs. The story came alive...." Read more

"...And this one is wordy, preachy, full of political blab. But fun to read, nevertheless, with a new and interesting premise.. Worth the time, .Hire a..." Read more

Customers find the book a good read in true Ludlum style. They also say the premise is interesting and the book did not disappoint. Readers also mention that the author tells a great story.

"...Ludlum did not disappoint his fans. This is an amazing book that reveals nothing until the last chapter and even then the suspense does not let up..." Read more

"The reader for this product does a very good job with all of the voices and reads very clear and keeps the listerner interested...." Read more

"...But fun to read, nevertheless, with a new and interesting premise.. Worth the time, .Hire a technical consultant for God's sake, Bob!" Read more

"Interesting and layered character, and love his new sniper sidekick. Was touch and go there for a while, but good finally triumphed over evi!...." Read more

"Not much of a reader but I'm buying the next in the series. Love the detail of characters...." Read more

Customers are mixed about the writing style. Some find the book well-written, with a great story. They also say the author is a master at describing in detail. However, some find the writing too wordy and the book does not read like his other books.

"...for this product does a very good job with all of the voices and reads very clear and keeps the listerner interested...." Read more

"...However, bought the e-book & have to say the typo's were terrible! I have never seen so many & it was quite distracting." Read more

"Well written with exact detail. The unknown was always present. I highly recommend this entire series to anyone who enjoys intriguing novels." Read more

"...Even better was the fact that there were virtually no typos! I have become sadly accepting of typos in most Kindle books...." Read more

Customers are mixed about the pacing. Some mention that the plot is complex and hard to put down, while others say that it drags on in spots.

"...some violence, action packed with a fairly complex plot and a good pace so you stay interested, this book will fit all that criteria, as will any..." Read more

"I was anxious for this book to end as it was becoming very tedious with its constant backtracking from the present to the main character's..." Read more

"...It was hard to put down. I highly recomend this book. I will be looking for more books to down load to my Kindle Fire" Read more
